content: Head back up along the brook and climb up to the middle part of the river. Here you can head upsteam and harvest a variety of materials as you do, just beware of some Croaky enemies hiding in the waters.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Valley_of_Ecstasy_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Valley of Ecstasy Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Brook of Bliss'.
The content is as follows:
Head back up along the brook and climb up to the middle part of the river. Here you can head upsteam and harvest a variety of materials as you do, just beware of some Croaky enemies hiding in the waters.
